title: IAA Tonight | Brittney Griner Pleads Guilty and College Conference Shakeup
description: Phoenix Mercury star Brittney Griner pleaded guilty to drug charges in a Russian court on Thursday. Audacy Legal Analyst Amy Dash helps us understand the fallout of her decision as she faces up to 10 years in prison. College conferences could see major realignment in the near future, but why is this happening and which schools should seek to leave their current conference?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Amy Dash, Leger Douzable, Chantel Tremitiere, Omar Kelly)
